title: Paul Whitehouse's Sketch Show Years
overview: Paul Whitehouse celebrates sketch shows in a new four-part series.Personally curated and narrated by Paul, the series takes viewers on a journey through his favourite British sketch shows of the past 60 years, with each episode broadly covering a decade in sketch show history, from iconic shows such as The Two Ronnies, to The Catherine Tate Show which have mirrored the story of modern Britain.
